item.title: C# 14 Extension Members: Enhancing Polyfill Libraries
item.description: C# has long supported extension methods, allowing developers to add new methods to existing types without modifying the original type. However, this capability was limited to instance methods. With C# 14, the language introduces extension members, significantly expanding what you can extend. You can now add extension properties and extension static methods to existing types. This enhancement isâ€¦ Link to article: https://www.meziantou.net/csharp-14-extension-members-enhancing-polyfill-libraries.htm?utm_medium=social&utm_source=syndication
